title: Now
description: What Nathan Knowler is up to right now.
html:
• Spending time with my family.
  • Building my website.
  • Improving my pizza making skills.
  • Learning how to bake bread.
    • Starting a sourdough starter. Need to research more.
  • Thinking of use cases and building examples for the “Host layerable shadow roots” proposal.
  • Learning drums.
